title: Residential solar PV : U.S. market value 2016
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Market value in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
Overall Market value in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Market value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Market value in billion U.S. dollars, about 4.7 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Market value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1.2 was reported at Year 2011
